entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as performing the kiss, which implies they have a dark and ominous presence.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who jumps out of bed in response to the dementors' presence.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having done the same as Harry and jumping out of bed.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister who enters the ward with Snape and questions Harry's state.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as entering the ward with Fudge and seems to be in a position of authority.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is asked by Fudge if Harry has had any chocolate, implying she is responsible for Harry's care.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as being innocent and in danger of being kissed by the dementors.

entities.name: peter pettigrew
entities.description: Peter Pettigrew is revealed to have faked his own death, implying he is a traitor or a liar.

relationships.description: Harry is in danger of being kissed by the dementors.
Fudge asks Madam Pomfrey if Harry has had any chocolate.
Harry defends Sirius Black, claiming he is innocent.
Peter Pettigrew is implied to be a traitor of Sirius Black by faking his own death.
